Please note that there is 15.38 % increase of premium. Renewal increase Is due to yearly inflation and policy performance 

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form  

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.


Best Regards,

Dear Mr Hagop 

Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to bring to your attention that the existing policy of E FERNANDES AMALIA FELIZARDO with DUBAI NATIONAL INSURANCE is due for its annual renewal on 20/03/2025.

Kindly find attached herewith the renewal terms inclusive of the below for your review.

*	Renewal Quotation inclusive of 5% VAT – AED 731.85
*	Policy Wordings
*	Network List
*	Nasco Claim Guide
*	LUMI Mobile App

Please note that there is 15.38 % increase of premium. Renewal increase Is due to yearly inflation and policy performance

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.

Dear Mr Hagop 

Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to bring to your attention that the existing policy of E FERNANDES AMALIA FELIZARDO with DUBAI NATIONAL INSURANCE is due for its annual renewal on 20/03/2025.

Kindly find attached herewith the renewal terms inclusive of the below for your review.

*	Renewal Quotation inclusive of 5% VAT – AED 731.85
*	Policy Wordings
*	Network List
*	Nasco Claim Guide
*	LUMI Mobile App

Please note that there is 15.38 % increase of premium. Renewal increase Is due to yearly inflation and policy performance 

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form  

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.


Best Regards,

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.

Dear Mr Hagop 

Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to bring to your attention that the existing policy of E FERNANDES AMALIA FELIZARDO with DUBAI NATIONAL INSURANCE is due for its annual renewal on 20/03/2025.

Kindly find attached herewith the renewal terms inclusive of the below for your review.

*	Renewal Quotation inclusive of 5% VAT – AED 731.85
*	Policy Wordings
*	Network List
*	Nasco Claim Guide
*	LUMI Mobile App

Please note that there is 15.38 % increase of premium. Renewal increase Is due to yearly inflation and policy performance 

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form  

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.


Best Regards, 

Mohammad Imamuddin

Dear Mr Hagop 

Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to bring to your attention that the existing policy of E FERNANDES AMALIA FELIZARDO with DUBAI NATIONAL INSURANCE is due for its annual renewal on 20/03/2025.

Kindly find attached herewith the renewal terms inclusive of the below for your review.

*	Renewal Quotation inclusive of 5% VAT – AED 731.85
*	Policy Wordings
*	Network List
*	Nasco Claim Guide
*	LUMI Mobile App

Please note that there is 15.38 % increase of premium. Renewal increase Is due to yearly inflation and policy performance 

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form

Alternatively, if you wish to proceed with the renewal, please provide the below:

1.	Signed and dated renewal quotation
2.	Valid passport, visa & Emirates ID copies of all members
3.	Labor Contract
4.	KYC Form  

Why Renew with the Same Insurer?

*	Seamless Coverage: Maintain uninterrupted access to your healthcare benefits and avoid any gaps in coverage.
*	Ease of Renewal: Skip the hassle of disclosing additional medical history or undergoing underwriting processes.
*	Trusted Service: Stay with an insurer whose support and coverage you already know and trust.
*	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure adherence to mandatory health insurance regulations in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, avoiding penalties for non-compliance.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.


Best Regards, 

Mohammad Imamuddin
Senior Client Relationship Executive - Individual Clients
